title: The First Time I Said Goodbye
description: Would you hold on tighter if you knew you were saying goodbye forever?In 1959, factory girl Stella Hegarty unexpectedly falls for the charms of a handsome US marine based in Derry. Caught up in a whirlwind romance that rivals the great love stories in the movies she adores, Stella begins to plan a new life in America with her beloved Ray. But when tragedy strikes, both their lives are thrown into turmoil. They come to realize that they may have said their first—and last—goodbye.Fast forward to 2010. Annabel Jackson, still reeling from the loss of her beloved father, agrees to accompany her mother, Stella, back to Ireland to meet her family for the first time. As the pair arrive in Derry, they both begin to understand that sometimes you have to say goodbye to what you thought you always wanted in order to find what you’ve needed all along.
author: Claire Allan
